definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)

sentences.english: China Philharmonic Orchestra is putting on a series of twelve concerts in winter.
sentences.chinese: 今年冬天中國愛樂樂團將舉辦十二場系列音樂會。

sentences.english: The following information is provided by the Macao Orchestra of ICM and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下資料由文化局澳門樂團提供，學生事務處代傳。

sentences.english: The Beatles created some of the best-loved songs of all time.
sentences.chinese: 披頭四樂團創作出一些史上最受歡迎的歌曲。

sentences.english: The Lahti orchestra has the most extensive cooperation with the world of business.
sentences.chinese: 拉赫蒂交響樂團與企業界與着最廣泛的合作。

sentences.english: The ship's orchestra's conductor stood to one side, looking peeved but apprehensive.
sentences.chinese: 艦隊的管弦樂團指揮站在一邊，面色雖慍怒但很知趣。

sentences.english: The following information is provided by the Macao Chinese Orchestra of ICM and posted by Student Affairs Section.
sentences.chinese: 以下資料由文化局澳門中樂團提供，學生事務處代傳。

sentences.english: After the clang or of organ majestic, or chorus, or perfect band.
sentences.chinese: 當莊嚴的風琴，或者合唱隊，或整個樂團，演奏完了。

sentences.english: The London Symphony Orchestra  broadcasts every Sunday on London Station.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦交響樂團每星期日都在倫敦電臺演出節目。

sentences.english: The present art director is the well-known conductor Cao Peng.
sentences.chinese: 目前，樂團由著名指揮家曹鵬任藝術總監。

sentences.english: It was from the four-member British group the Beatles.
sentences.chinese: 由英國四人樂團甲殼蟲演唱。

sentences.english: I didn't know you like the Beastie Boys so much.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你這麼喜歡野獸男孩樂團。

sentences.english: Shanghai Symphony has been endeavoring to promote Chinese music and is its most authoritative interpreter.
sentences.chinese: 樂團力推中國作品，是中國交響音樂最權威的詮釋者。

sentences.english: Transit Haoyue that world, everywhere complains Le reunion.
sentences.chinese: 中天皓月明世界，遍地笙歌樂團圓。

sentences.english: He worked with the BBC Philharmonic and the Royal Opera House in London.
sentences.chinese: 他在倫敦曾與BBC交響樂團和英國皇家歌劇院合作。

sentences.english: A work in which a solo instruments is contrasted and blended with the orchestra.
sentences.chinese: 獨奏樂器與管弦樂團互相對比和合作的作品。

sentences.english: Their rock band is going to record their first record next month.
sentences.chinese: 下個月她們的搖滾樂團將灌錄她們的第一張唱片。

definition: (of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
